title: Enhancing Systems Design Practical Competencies: Constructivist Understanding Processes via Chemical Molecular Structure Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between the physical properties of chemical substances and their molecular structures using molecular-level visualization materials.
Learners can construct accurate mental models through molecular animations and simulations by applying constructivist learning strategies.
Learners can apply learned molecular visualization concepts to solve real-world chemistry problems through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
